text: Edmund N. Ansin (March 9, 1936 â€“ July 26, 2020) was an American billionaire. He was co-founder of Sunbeam Television. Ansin was born in Worcester, Massachusetts. In March 2014, his net worth was $1.4 billion.Forbes: The World's Billionaires - Edmund Ansin March 2014 Ansin died on July 26, 2020 in Miami Beach, Florida at the age of 84.Loss of a Leader: WSVN owner Ed Ansin passes away at 84 July 27, 2020 ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American billionaires Category:Businesspeople from Massachusetts
title: Edmund Ansin
